meaningMnemonic: A <radical>drunkard</radical> gets his hands on a <radical>plow</radical> and starts <kanji>planting</kanji> right away. Drunk people are surprisingly good at planting, especially when they have machines to help them do it.
readingMnemonic: He keeps <kanji>planting</kanji> and planting... a little too much. You walk over and realize this drunkard isn't just any guy... he's YOUR <reading>CY</reading>BORG (さい)!
